title: OM Breakfast Scramblers R3, 03.22.2023  WIENIE KINGS ‘BETTING’  To fuel the hype

title: INSTAGRAM Curated Escape  Instagram is the go-to platform for visual inspiration
description: > Give      Moments of Respite:  Mini Meditation Series:         Leverage carousel storytelling: Build mini visual journeys that users can swipe through at their own pace for a moment of calm engagement.  Use Stories for gentle nudges: Post quiet, aesthetically pleasing updates or tips that subtly inspire, without overwhelming.  Pin key posts: Keep foundational content easily accessible to reinforce reliability and consistency in the brand’s messaging.    : Stories or Reels from trusted creators

title: PINTEREST Personal Aspiration  Pinterest is the platform for discovery and idea
description: > Creative ideas include visually soothing mood boards, minimalist styling inspiration, or guided collections that help users feel organized, inspired, and in control of their world.  [breakdown of the platform, what it’s offering to the audience and inspo for how we can leverage]   Mood boards for calm, design inspiration, styling with ease This is where our 2D can thrive!
